extendedInfo.description: Dedicated to road cycling, Cyclist magazine reviews the best road bikes and gear. Special offer: purchase an annual subscription and get your first 2 issues free!Dedicated solely to road cycling, Cyclist is the very first magazine of its kind. A celebration of the freedom to explore and the gear that makes road cycling special, Cyclist will take you on the worldâs most stunning rides and get behind the doors of iconic brands. With performance advice from top experts, we unearth tall tales from the pro peloton and get you up-close to the best road bikes and cycling gear. Plus, Cyclist mixes in-depth articles with breathtaking imagery from the sportâs best photographers. Itâs the road cycling magazine youâve been waiting for. Youâll get everything thatâs in the print version in an app-friendly format, plus additional images, video content and 360Â° views of the latest bikes. SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS When you subscribe to Cyclist magazine youâll automatically get the latest issue for free. If you take out an annual subscription youâll receive 2 free issues. â¢ Purchase a single issue Â£3.99 â¢ Purchase a 1 issue subscription Â£3.99â¢ Purchase an annual subscription Â£39.99â¢ We take your privacy seriously, please read our privacy policy for more information: http://www.dennis.co.uk/privacy

reviews.comment: Brilliant app for reading the mag. The first time iv used a tablet primarily for reading
reviews.author: Benjamin Childs

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: A well developed magazine with great articles and wonderful photography
reviews.author: mark james

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Very readable magazine with varied articles and great photography and presentation. Best of the road cycling mags out there at the moment.
reviews.author: lfoggy f

reviews.title: What on earth is this?
reviews.comment: Where\'s the magazine formatting? Where\'s the images? Just seems to be a text dump. Ugly and disappointing. Crashed twice while trying to download the free issue too.
reviews.author: John Stuart

reviews.title: Great look, but navigation doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The magazine looks great, but I can\'t get the navigation to work. It jumps between pages and goes back to the page I started from. Tye bar at the bottom won\'t do anything. Maybe it\'s just a Galaxy Tab problem? I remain hopeful,  but will be going back to the paper copy for now.
reviews.author: Paul Griffiths

reviews.title: At last!
reviews.comment: I can finally use my digital subscription on my Android devices, hallelujah! Definitely the best road cycling mag out there, really good mix of articles. Especially like the travel stories.
reviews.author: Tony Roberts

reviews.title: So happy this app has come to android.
reviews.comment: Excellent magazine, I have used the apple app and it is fantastic. Few bugs on the android version just now but I\'m sure they will get it sorted soon.   Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Daniel Webb

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Lovely photography, excellent articles and very well written. Only drawback is envy and finding time to ride their route
reviews.author: Joshua Hartland

reviews.comment: Best cycling magazine by far. Great app.
reviews.author: stuart higgins

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Fewer ads and more valuable content. Definitely one of my favorite cycling publications.
reviews.author: Jerry Kuamoo

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: An excellent magazine and excellent app
reviews.author: Luke Wallace

reviews.comment: Finally aversion for Android... My subscription is worth every penny. Works a treat.
reviews.author: Daniel Sutton

reviews.title: At last
reviews.comment: So good to have the online subscription of this great magazine available on something other than an iPad
reviews.author: Paul Helyer

reviews.title: Excellent, new versipn works perfectly
reviews.comment: Original version had a problem with changing pages, but this is fixed now and the magazine looks great.
reviews.author: Paul Griffiths

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Quite hard to flick between pages. Not as smooth as most of the good Android apps.
reviews.author: Miles Carter
